Assists.name: Ardent Sacrifice
Assists.effect: Heals adjacent ally 10 HP. Unit loses 10 HP (but cannot reach 0 this way).

Assists.name: Dance
Assists.effect: Enables target to take another action. Cannot be used on units with Sing or Dance.

Assists.name: Draw Back
Assists.effect: Unit moves 1 space away from target ally, who moves to units former position.

Assists.name: Harsh Command
Assists.effect: Converts penalties on target into bonuses.

Assists.name: Heal
Assists.effect: Restores 5 HP.

Assists.name: Martyr
Assists.effect: Restores HP=7+ this units suffered damage. Unit Heals HP=half suffered damage. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Assists.name: Mend
Assists.effect: Restores 10 HP.

Assists.name: Physic
Assists.effect: Restores 8 HP to a target (rest of translation wrong: "and all allies within 2 spaces of target.")

Assists.name: Pivot
Assists.effect: Unit moves to opposite side of adjacent ally.

Assists.name: Rally Attack
Assists.effect: Grants Atk+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Assists.name: Rally Defense
Assists.effect: Grants Def+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Assists.name: Rally Resistance
Assists.effect: Grants Res+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Assists.name: Rally Speed
Assists.effect: Grants Spd+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Assists.name: Reciprocal Aid
Assists.effect: Swap HP with adjacent ally (neither unit can go above their max HP.

Assists.name: Reconcile
Assists.effect: Restores 7 HP each to target and this unit.

Assists.name: Recover
Assists.effect: Restores 15 HP. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Assists.name: Rehabilitate
Assists.effect: Restores 7 HP or more the further below 50% the target's HP is. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Assists.name: Reposition
Assists.effect: Moves adjacent ally to opposite side of unit.

Assists.name: Shove
Assists.effect: Push adjacent ally 1 space farther away.

Assists.name: Sing
Assists.effect: Enables target to take another action. Cannot be used on units with Sing or Dance.

Assists.name: Smite
Assists.effect: Push adjacent ally 2 spaces further away.

Assists.name: Swap
Assists.effect: Swap places with adjacent ally.

Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Bowbreaker 2
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Bowbreaker 3
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Brash Assault 1
Passives.effects: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP ≤ 30% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Passives.name: Brash Assault 2
Passives.effects: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP ≤ 40% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Passives.name: Brash Assault 3
Passives.effects: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP ≤ 50% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Passives.name: Daggerbreaker 1
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Daggerbreaker 2
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Daggerbreaker 3
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Desperation 1
Passives.effects: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 25%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Passives.name: Desperation 2
Passives.effects: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Passives.name: Desperation 3
Passives.effects: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Passives.name: Drag Back
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, the unit moves 1 space away after combat. Foe moves into unit's previous space.

Passives.name: Escape Route 1
Passives.effects: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 30% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Passives.name: Escape Route 2
Passives.effects: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 40% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Passives.name: Escape Route 3
Passives.effects: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 50% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Passives.name: G Tomebreaker 1
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: G Tomebreaker 2
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: G Tomebreaker 3
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Knock Back
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

Passives.name: Lancebreaker 1
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Lancebreaker 2
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Lancebreaker 3
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Live to Serve 1
Passives.effects: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 50% of the HP restored.

Passives.name: Live to Serve 2
Passives.effects: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 75% of the HP restored.

Passives.name: Live to Serve 3
Passives.effects: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers the same amount.

Passives.name: Lunge
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, after combat, unit and targeted foe swap places.

Passives.name: Obstruct 1
Passives.effects: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 90%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Passives.name: Obstruct 2
Passives.effects: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 70%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Passives.name: Obstruct 3
Passives.effects: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 50%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Passives.name: Pass 1
Passives.effects: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 75%.

Passives.name: Pass 2
Passives.effects: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 50%.

Passives.name: Pass 3
Passives.effects: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 25%.

Passives.name: Poison Strike 1
Passives.effects: Inflicts 4 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Passives.name: Poison Strike 2
Passives.effects: Inflicts 7 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Passives.name: Poison Strike 3
Passives.effects: Inflicts 10 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Passives.name: Quick Riposte 1
Passives.effects: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 90%.

Passives.name: Quick Riposte 2
Passives.effects: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 80%.

Passives.name: Quick Riposte 3
Passives.effects: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 70%.

Passives.name: R Tomebreaker 1
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: R Tomebreaker 2
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: R Tomebreaker 3
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Renewal 1
Passives.effects: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

Passives.name: Renewal 2
Passives.effects: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

Passives.name: Renewal 3
Passives.effects: At the start of every second turn, restores 10 HP.

Passives.name: Seal Atk 1
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Atk-3 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Atk 2
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Atk-5 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Atk 3
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Atk-7 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Def 1
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Def-3 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Def 2
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Def-5 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Def 3
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Def-7 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Res 1
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Res-3 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Res 2
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Res-5 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Res 3
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Res-7 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Spd 1
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Spd-3 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Spd 2
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Spd-5 through its next action.

Passives.name: Seal Spd 3
Passives.effects: After combat, foe suffers Spd-7 through its next action.

Passives.name: Swordbreaker 1
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Swordbreaker 2
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Swordbreaker 3
Passives.effects: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

Passives.name: Vantage 1
Passives.effects: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 25%.

Passives.name: Vantage 2
Passives.effects: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 50%.

Passives.name: Vantage 3
Passives.effects: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 75%.

Passives.name: Wary Fighter 1
Passives.effects: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 90%.

Passives.name: Wary Fighter 2
Passives.effects: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 80%.

Passives.name: Wary Fighter 3
Passives.effects: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 70%.

Passives.name: Wings of Mercy 1
Passives.effects: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 30%.

Passives.name: Wings of Mercy 2
Passives.effects: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 40%.

Passives.name: Wings of Mercy 3
Passives.effects: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 50%.

Passives.name: Breath of Life 1
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 3 HP after combat.

Passives.name: Breath of Life 2
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 5 HP after combat.

Passives.name: Breath of Life 3
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 7 HP after combat.

Passives.name: Fortify Armor
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent armor allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Cavalry
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent cavalry allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Def 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Def 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Def 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Fliers
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent flying allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Res 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Res 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Fortify Res 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Goad Armor
Passives.effects: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Goad Cavalry
Passives.effects: Grants cavalry allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Goad Fliers
Passives.effects: Grants flying allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Hone Armor
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent armored allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Atk 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Atk 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Atk 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Cavalry
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent cavalry allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Fliers
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent flying allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Spd 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Spd 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Hone Spd 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Savage Blow 1
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 3 damage after combat.

Passives.name: Savage Blow 2
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 5 damage after combat.

Passives.name: Savage Blow 3
Passives.effects: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 7 damage after combat.

Passives.name: Spur Atk 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Atk 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Atk 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Def 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Def 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Def 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Res 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Res 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Res 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Spd 1
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Spd 2
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 during combat.

Passives.name: Spur Spd 3
Passives.effects: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Threaten Atk 1
Passives.effects: Inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Atk 2
Passives.effects: Inflicts Atk-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Atk 3
Passives.effects: Inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Def 1
Passives.effects: Inflicts Def-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Def 2
Passives.effects: Inflicts Def-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Def 3
Passives.effects: Inflicts Def-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Res 1
Passives.effects: Inflicts Res-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Res 2
Passives.effects: Inflicts Res-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Res 3
Passives.effects: Inflicts Res-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Spd 1
Passives.effects: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Spd 2
Passives.effects: Inflicts Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Threaten Spd 3
Passives.effects: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

Passives.name: Ward Armor
Passives.effects: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Ward Cavalry
Passives.effects: Grants cavalry allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.

Passives.name: Ward Fliers
Passives.effects: Grants flying allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.
